protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Affimetrix Expression Console Software using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity
seeds were stratified for 2 days and grown for 10 days on solid (0.8% Agar) MS in an plant incubator only the aerial part was harvested
RNeasy Mini Plant kit supplied with RNase-Free DNase set (Qiagen)
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, cRNA was hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affimetrix Genechip Scanner 3000
